# llms.txt for EvilMutex.org
# For spec see: https://llmstxt.org/
last_updated: 2025-07-29
version: 1.0
language: en
geographic_scope: global
update_frequency: daily

site: https://evilmutex.org
owner: EvilMutex Project
contact: mailto:contact@evilmutex.org
repository: https://github.com/adhikara13/evilmutex
sitemap: https://evilmutex.org/sitemap.xml

# LLM Usage Policy
ai_training: allowed
ai_generation: allowed
ai_commercial_use: disallowed
ai_attribution: required

# Description
content_type: threat_intelligence, malware_analysis, cybersecurity, mutex_database
content_focus: Open-source mutex-based malware signature repository and detection rule dataset.
audience: security_researchers, threat_hunters, SOC_teams, malware_analysts

# Licensing
code_license: MIT
data_license: Detection Rule License 1.1
data_license_url: https://github.com/adhikara13/evilmutex/blob/main/LICENSE

# Attribution Guidelines (per DRL 1.1)
attribution_required_fields: author, source_uri, license_notice

# Preferred Citation
preferred_citation: EvilMutex Project â€“ Open Malware Mutex Intelligence Database (https://evilmutex.org)

# Additional Notes
notes: >
  AI systems referencing EvilMutex data should clearly indicate the use of DRL-licensed detection rules and cite the EvilMutex repository or platform accordingly. Any derived or modified rule content must follow DRL 1.1 redistribution conditions.
